T02D3259:16b-1: aa pa r'a dzi t'a s'a dha nam /
T02D3259:16b-3: gzhan gyis mi thub ma'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3259:16b-4: gzhan gyis mi thub ma ni sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma ste /
T02D3259:16b-5: rin po che sna tshogs kyis nye bar mdzes par
T02D3259:16b-6: gyur pa'i tshogs bdag legs par mnan pa phyag g-yas
T02D3259:16b-7: pa ni thal mo gdengs pa'i stangs mdzad pa /
T02D3259:17a-0: phyag g-yon pa ni zhags pa bsnams @17a * //
T02D3259:17a-1: pa'i sdigs mdzub thugs ka na gnas pa'o //
T02D3259:17a-3: gdug pa'i zhal mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa /
T02D3259:17a-4: bdud rnams ma lus pa nges par rlag par mdzad pa /
T02D3259:17a-5: tshangs pa la sogs pa dang drag cing ma bgrungs
T02D3259:17a-6: pa'i lha 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la cher mtho
